glsa.title: 3proxy: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in 3proxy, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service.

background.p: 3proxy is a really tiny cross-platform proxy servers set, including HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SOCKS and POP3 support.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request to the proxy, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service. Under typical configuration, the scope of this vulnerability is limited to the local network.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All 3proxy users should upgrade to the latest version:
